channel.title: A Question about posting :D
channel.description:
Can anyone tell me, where would i post a single part of a server, sorry im not sure what id call it, if i want to post JUST a minigame that i made but not the entire server? since the only thing i made was the minigame so i don't want people yelling at me saying the server is not my work.
EDIT: Cmon, someone has to know! a mod or something!
